website_summaries.verdict: Aside from a few quirks, this pretty wallet is just as functional and looks just as nice as its leather competitors - but for a value price.
pros: An affordable wallet that's nicely crafted of faux leather, which is a plus for ladies who prefer vegan accessories
Offers a classic design with ample space, including a zippered compartment and 8 card slots
cons: The zipper has been known to jam, and some seams tend to fray over time
Arrives with a strange odor that may fade with use

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love love this wallet. It has the space that is need with out it being overly bulky. The picture of the design dose not do it justice. I have been looking for a wallet to replace my old one of 13 years and this one tops the cake! The one and only thing that kinda sucks is the pockets for cards are deep and you have to double up on the number of cards per pocket because theres not enough of them. I used my direct tv remote to help people size the wallet
customer_reviews.author: Kassandra

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for the price mainly as I had just misplaced and lost my previous wallet that cost much more money. To my surprise this has held up (1.5 years now) incredibly well! Yes I realize my review is late but hey at least I can comment on how sturdy this wallet is. The design is adorable and I have yet to purchase anything more expensive as this covers my needs just fine and goes along style wise with my purses and clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet! But Very Tight Slots!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely, large wallet! Hard to get cards in and out of slots, but I've had it for so long now that they are starting to (slowly) loosen up! Just be careful if you have any problems with gross motor abilities! Could be frustrating to people that have a hard time with using fingers and hands! It's a struggle to get my ID out every single time I need it. (A tip: I put the cards I use often - my ID and debits - in the large money slot. It is less of a fight and has made me enjoy the wallet even more!!!)
customer_reviews.author: Brenna Dia

customer_reviews.title: Love this wallet!
customer_reviews.text: The Good: This wallet holds everything I wanted it to -- plenty of cash, several cards ( with two clear pockets for IDs), there's a zippered pocket for change, and it even holds my large 6SPlus iPhone! Pretty design. The Bad: Since it does have such a large capacity a well as thick padding, it is a fairly large and thick wallet which is great to use as a clutch but difficult to fit in smaller purses. Overall: I love this wallet! Excellent for anyone who still carries cash and coins. If you carry no cash and many cards, you may want to look for a different design. Makes a stylish, useful clutch and can even fit your phone!
customer_reviews.author: Kaley

customer_reviews.title: My favorite color
customer_reviews.text: Actual color is a bit lighter he expected..but nice wallet Seems pretty solidly made to withstand wear and long term use...stitching seems good...it is leather but don’t expect that soft supple kind that ages well, gets softer..but is very nice Comes wrapped and place in an extremely nice box so would be perfect for gifting Overall...I am very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Lainey

customer_reviews.title: Spacious yet compact !
customer_reviews.text: This is a well functioning wallet. I love all the slots for cards and large compartments for bills! I always find my bills get stuck in my wallets but this one has plenty of room! I got this for my sister in law but I like it so much I’m going to buy one for myself ! The material feels so nice and thick too .
customer_reviews.author: Sterling Sauve

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Wallet for Price!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality for the price. It seems a tad bit bigger than a "normal sized" wallet, but since I carry a bigger purse that's no problem for me. It is beautiful and unique and I've gotten multiple compliments on it. It is very sturdy and I have been using it for months now and it still looks as good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor G.

customer_reviews.title: "Trick" wallet retains credit cards and won't give them back!
customer_reviews.text: This is a "trick" wallet - it almost seems like some sort of cruel joke. Credit cards slip down into the wallet pockets and *if* you can find them when you need the card, you can't remove the card from the wallet without using a razor to rip the wallet card slot. The wallet is decorated nicely on the outside and seems like it would be nice until you can't find your card. I had no idea that a wallet could eat my cards especially when I'm in a hurry at a cash register with people crowded in line behind me. Really disappointing purchase for me.
customer_reviews.author: J. Picard

customer_reviews.title: Snap on flap doesn't hold up
customer_reviews.text: I love this wallet, look, feel, capacity, whole 9 yards. What I don't love is that the snap on the flap is already torn, and am going to have to glue it or find another way to secure it. 3/29/2019 This wallet was purchased on 8/21/2019, and as you can see, the clasp that I mentioned in the 1st part of the review has now fallen off, and it's lost, I can't find it to glue it back on. The wallet lasted a total of 7 month, so I dropped the rating from a 3 to a 1 star. Not a happy person now as I have to buy a new wallet...
customer_reviews.author: Lori K

customer_reviews.title: Love the pockets
customer_reviews.text: Love the pockets! I have like way too many store rewards cards and punch cards. Love that it is now keeping my purse organized.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this beautiful wallet and satisfied with quality of the craftsmanship. This is a very roomy and versatile wallet that holds quite a few cards. This even hold my S7 cell phone when I need something to protect it in my purse. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a very handsome and functional wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Smith

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t had a year, snap already broke BUT super nice looking wallet!
customer_reviews.text: LOVED this wallet. I understand the pockets are tight BUT I don’t want my cards falling out of my wallet every time I open it so I am not bothered by the tight fit, so I turned the cards 90 degrees, now I have easy access and a tight fit still. Only complaint, the snap came apart! The magnet is so tight that it pulled the male button out of the fabric, trying crazy glue, next I will try fabric glue because I really really love this wallet. I may purchase another one because its pretty and still looks brand new so the quality is great until you get to the snap.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Credit cards / business cards don’t fit
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. But the card pockets are too big (deep so card top doesn’t stick out to grab) for a credit card & too small for a business card (too narrow for standard business card) No easy access to license spot. I wanted to like this. And I bought 2 one for my girlfriend and one for myself. But once I tried switching over from my current wallet - i knew right away it would be a disaster actually using it. So my 8 & 10 yo girls can have them  ̄\_(ツ)_/ ̄
customer_reviews.author: mstaralynn

customer_reviews.title: Gift worthy
customer_reviews.text: Packaging is very gift worthy. Came in a very nice box. My credit cards fit into the credit card holders without me trying to shove them in- this is wonderful. Beautiful Green color leather wallet I am sure I will enjoy for a long time. Easy access to all my wallet contents- I like this. Wish the snap closure was stronger as I tend to really stuff alot into my wallet
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Looks Very Expensive, Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is just gorgeous!!!!! Love how it came in a beautiful box, was wrapped in tissue paper and just looked like I got a very expensive wallet. I like that my iPhone fits in it, has plenty or card holders and has lots of room to carry papers and business cars that I need. The outside is beautiful too with really pretty cut outs. I am going to get another one in a different color so I can use it with other purses and still have a wallet I love. When I bought it it was $14.00 and looks like a $1400.00 one. I highly recommend this wallet!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: dispatchgirl

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not functional
customer_reviews.text: After giving this wallet ample time before reviewing. I will be searching for a new one. The card slots are not functional and it is halfway cheaply made. Your cards slide down not to the side and get caught on part of the material.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey Gilliam

customer_reviews.title: Zipper on inside broke within 1 MONTH OF USE!  and Pockets were very tight!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the Worse purchase I have ever made on Amazon!!! I bought this wallet 1 month ago and the zipper within the billfold section is already broken. The slots for cards is sooooo tight that the cards barely fit at all. And on the window "ID" slots, the cards cannot be pushed down all the way to be seen and FORGET about being able to get your ID card/License out again quickly if you are carded!!! And to top it off, I ordered Purple....and it looks like a dark pink, not purple at all!
customer_reviews.author: jgraham

customer_reviews.title: Ehh? Didn’t work out for me.
customer_reviews.text: This came with glue all over it when first received. Once I got all of that off it was a very cute wallet and was far big enough to hold everything however I’ve had it for a month or more now and the magnatic piece ripped off so I was fairly disappointed considering the amount of money I paid for it. Wouldn’t recommend if you use you wallet often because opening often seems to put stress on that piece and it breaks off. Also the pockets for the cards are almost two narrow and it’s very difficult to pull any of the cards out.
customer_reviews.author: KristinaMarie

customer_reviews.title: You will LOVE this Wallet!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this wallet! I have looked for years for a decent wallet that will hold everything I need it to. This Ourbag is perfect! It holds everything with space left over! It is a great style with a nice looking design. I ordered the pink one....first. Lol I have found when I like something, I better go ahead and get an extra. So I did and my Peacock Blue clutch arrived yesterday. They are both beautiful, vivid colors. I am so happy with this item AND this seller! Each one arrived so fast. So give it a try. Ya better order 2! Lol The seller also enclosed a nice season greeting card. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda S. Grubb

customer_reviews.title: 2 stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made and matches the purse I bought. I have to take the above statement back and rescind my previous review. The zipper is torn away from the lining and now will only unzip about 2 ". This WAS where I kept my change. Now the change falls out the 2" hole. So, I won't be using that feature. Too bad, because I loved this wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very nice wallet with one small problem. The slots for credit cards are just a bit too small. The cards will fit, but it is very hard for my wife to get them out (this may be a blessing..lol). The slot for her I.D. is the same, just a bit too small. Surely the manufacturer knows the size of a credit card and can make a wallet to accommodate them...
customer_reviews.author: Observer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this wallet
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this wallet. This is the first time I've ever purchased a wallet on-line. I've always felt that if I can't see how it's made and feel it, then I shouldn't buy it. But after reading the reviews, I decided to take a chance. It is absolutely beautiful and feels awesome. My IPhone 6 fits perfectly inside and I have plenty of room for insurance cards, etc. to fit inside. So glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: GrandmaJean

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty
customer_reviews.text: It came packaged in a gift box which was nice but honestly wasteful. If I was planning to give it as a gift I would have appreciated it much more. It would be nice to have the option to not have the box in order to save money for the vendor and save it from the landfill. Min3 also came with a strong smell. Normally I can't smell anything so if I say it's a strong smell I can't imagine how strong it is for someone with a properly working sniffer on their face.
customer_reviews.author: RetTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it's really leather...
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I'm terribly disappointed in my new wallet. First, I'm not even convinced that it's really leather. It doesn't feel or smell like leather. Secondly, the color in the picture and the color I receive are completely different. What I received is more of a washed out pink than purple. And third, my car's don't fit in the "card holder" portion of the wallet. The slots are too tight to fit a normal sized credit card.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie B RN

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed-Functional flaws in clasps & zippers
customer_reviews.text: Some flaws to overall design. Clasp doesn't clasp tight to keep it closed. Inside zippered pocket does not have a zipper pull so not sure if this is a defect but makes it hard to use the zippered pouch. The design on it is pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design and material but does not fit iPhone 11 Pro Max in thin rubber phone case
customer_reviews.text: I ended up having to send this back, but I want to write a review b/c this wallet was more pleasing then the photos portray. It's one of those things that "just felt good in my hands" -- like a textured hand thrown pottery bowl. The color was beautify and said "feminine" but "professional". I hope to see OURBAG make this wallet a bit roomier to accommodate larger cell phones in both slim and medium width cases.
customer_reviews.author: Nate's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it- started falling apart.
customer_reviews.text: The ID window & CC pocket’s stitches already started coming off. It’s torn. It was way too tight to begin with. I have used this wallet for 3 months. Bottomline, I would not recommend this- spend little more money & buy better quality. Gave it a 2 star as it has good looks but no quality.
customer_reviews.author: Deekay

customer_reviews.title: Can't fit a credit card in here
customer_reviews.text: The pockets where you put credit cards were too small to fit a credit card, also found they were glued together and when I attempted to open them up a little to fit in a credit card it completely ripped open and even after they ripped open I thought I would try the credit cards again and the slots were still too small to actually fit the card in the correct way without a great struggle So, that makes this wallet unusable as you can't keep credit cards in it...very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: I almost got this awhile back and didn't. So getting it now I got a smaller purse so I needed a thinner wallet, honestly this is kinda the same size as my other wallet but I wanted a new one anyways so I'll make it work haha or get a new purse. lol But it's got enough spots for my cards and it has an attached change section which I look for in a wallet so it's exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: PresleyC

customer_reviews.title: Stunning, but card holder is a bit tight.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous wallet, it's defentily a nice size, and the art work on the outside is stunning. Though I found a few flaws, like some extra glue coming out from the edges and the card holder is very extremely tight, a little bit of a challenge to get the cards in there. I feel if those things where fixed this would get a 5 star rating from me.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Reed

customer_reviews.title: Exceptionally nice, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: This wallet was exactly what I wanted except that it was way too big. I didn't pay close enough attention to the dimensions when I ordered it. It's beautiful, seems to be well-made, and the color and design are just what I wanted. Sadly, it won't fit in my fairly large purse. I'm not going to return it, I'm going to give it as a gift, because it is, after all, a very nice wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi Somers

customer_reviews.title: Yes, buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wallet. I can fit everything I need in it and it looks great. It's actually better than I expected, the quality is fantastic, great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Ktp205

customer_reviews.title: Pretty to look at, but functionally frustrating.
customer_reviews.text: I like how the wallet looks. My problem with it is that the card holders are a little too big so your cards don't stick out the top and you can't just glance and find what you're looking for. And then when you want to pull a card out the seam is in just the wrong spot so that the cards are stuck and you have to do some maneuvering to finally get it out.
customer_reviews.author: leah much

customer_reviews.title: Not as large as they lead you to believe in the video
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why the questions are for a shoe, the wallet is a nice wallet but it does not hold near as much as the video leads you to believe that it can hold I bought it thinking I could also use it to hold my phone as well as other things I keep in my wallet and the video shows you can do all of that but it's not wide enough for that
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this wallet
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this wallet. It fits my 6s+ with an otterbox, cash, credit cards, change and keys super easily. 4 stars because the zipper is cheap and gets jammed easily. Otherwise the look and feel are sturdy, cute and it can handle what I put in it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Cute design and good size. Definitely has an odor coming out of the box, still waiting on that too go away after leaving it sitting out a few days.. Says leather a couple places in the description, but it's not real leather so just know that. All in all, good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Fits a good amount of things
customer_reviews.text: I don't have an insane amount of cards and things to put in my wallet, so it perfectly holds my moderate amount of items. Definitely worth it if you want a large but not huge wallet. And I like that it has two slots for ID cards to have the face showing, and a slot for bills to be laid in without having to fold them.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t recommend anyone ordering this wallet
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t the nicest wallet iv ever seen ..it came quick in the mail but it had glued all over the front of it and i tried scratching it off but it wouldn’t come off at all and it’s really noticeable. So I’m not going to be using it. I wouldn’t recommend anyone ordering this wallet.
customer_reviews.author: mart Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Fair
customer_reviews.text: it says leather, but, it is PU leather. It is OK for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Artytx

customer_reviews.title: Love the size and color
customer_reviews.text: Very nice wallet! I am very happy with this purchase and the leather is of good quality. However, it is prone to scratches from my fingernail, as I found out when I was inspecting it, but that's to be expected especially when it's going to be in my purse and tossed around with everything else. It holds all my cards my credit cards my store shopping discount cards my insurance cards and I still have room for more if I need. The snap enclosure holds my iPhone 6 Plus perfectly and I have another pocket for my bills in addition to the zippered enclosure which will hold my coin just fine. I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The color was exactly as pictured (I bought the green/blue) but i give it 3 stars because the slots for your cards are kind of tight if that makes sense. Still have a hard time getting the cards out sometimes! But otherwise a nice wallet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: It’s too long for my small purse. Disappointed. Hard to find something I like in a smaller size. I will probably gift it. The layers card area hides your cards so you don’t know where they are. Omg Beautiful color. Gorgeous craftsmanship
customer_reviews.author: Peia Edgerly

customer_reviews.title: and they are nice. But next wallet I will shop in a ...
customer_reviews.text: I only gave it 3 stars due to the strong chemical odor. After a week of airing outside, it's near acceptable to carry around. The design is cute. I didn't think I needed to get a leather wallet because so many bags aren't leather anymore, and they are nice. But next wallet I will shop in a store so I can pick it up and give it the sniff test.
customer_reviews.author: magster

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality closure and card slots
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wallet only 4 months ago and the snap closure has already broken off completely. Reading other reviews, I also had a difficult time with a sticky zipper and had to keep my ID and cards slightly above slot in order to access them without trouble, otherwise, it would take significant time trying to pull them out of the slots. I certainly do not believe this was worth the price I paid and wouldn't buy one again, even if I hadn't passed the 1 month return period. I don't have a choice to return anyway now.
customer_reviews.author: Margie

customer_reviews.title: Big but doesn't hold much
customer_reviews.text: I expected with how bulky this clutch is, that it would hold all my cards, cash, and change but it really doesn't hold much, I couldn't put everything I needed in it, I had to buy a different wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Petras

customer_reviews.title: Was NOT as pictured! Instead of the credit cards ...
customer_reviews.text: Was NOT as pictured! Instead of the credit cards sticking out of the slots so you can see which card to pull - the cards go into their pockets all the way so you cannot see the card at all. It's a mystery as to what's in each pocket so you can't find the card you want. I have to remove all my wallet items and return to my old wallet and need to shop for a new one all over again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Cook

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not what I thought...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice wallet, just not what I thought. Only reason I gave it 3 stars, because it was a little biller than I would like longer length wallet to be. Other than that, it’s fine. Just not why I wanted...
customer_reviews.author: Stevi L Boggus-Bell

customer_reviews.title: Loved this wallet until...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this purse on May 23, 2018 for my granddaughter's 16th birthday. She had picked it out on Amazon. So happy to find something she really had on her list. She really loved this wallet purse in brown until the snap no longer worked. She did not carry anything but her id and schhol money. She was really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Looks more expensive than is
customer_reviews.text: Once again, on Amazon, I say - good quality for the price. Every once in awhile, I think I can find what I need at a store. Didn’t. Found a simple wallet, longer, which I like. I can put my IPhone in one of the pockets of it , good to go. It looks somewhat expensive, the detailing and color are very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Jordano

customer_reviews.title: Gee, another of my reviews it posted.
customer_reviews.text: I can't even give this wallet one star. I couldn't fit credit cards, my drivers license or anything else in the slots. They were all too small, very small. This is useless. I didn't try to transfer my cards for 2 weeks after I received this. So I didn't return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT, LOVE IT, LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is exactly as pictured and described on-line. It is very well made and good-looking and I expect it to last for many years. I highly recommend this wallet to anyone looking for high quality and functionality!
customer_reviews.author: Toni63

customer_reviews.title: An Amazing Wallet!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect when I ordered this wallet. However, I was amazingly surprised with it's good quality, good looks and good price. I plan to order all my future wallets from OurBags. The service was quick & it was packaged to protect the entire wallet.
customer_reviews.author: D. Boykin

customer_reviews.title: I hate to give bad reviews but...
customer_reviews.text: I'll take responsibility for the first complaint I didn't correctly read the fine print to see that it was coming from China, which usually is ok BUT I kept receiving delays of shipping by the company so it took longer to get most importantly is the other reviews are correct the wallet has a smell to it, inside it's made of cheap plastic, credit cards don't fit on most slots; in short don't waste your money I don't even use it bc the clasp doesn't close properly I threw it in a drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C Durham

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Wallet
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful billfold, it’s very spacious, and fits my phone, cards, and money with no stress on it. It feels of great quality too... It’s large enough to be carried along and small enough to fit in a purse....
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Mack

customer_reviews.title: This wallet is amazing. No problems with the zipper
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is amazing. No problems with the zipper, has a magnetic snap and holds my Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge with room to spare. Plenty of slots, but, they are deep. Made to last. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: shortyswife

customer_reviews.title: Well-constructed; good as a clutch purse, also.
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful wallet. Compartments are great for every ID card and bank card needed. Coin area is ample and zipper holds coinage securely. Wallet is not too big for a backpack or tote. Also attractive as a clutch for quick trip to the store.
customer_reviews.author: vanessairvin93

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design
customer_reviews.text: Love the design on the wallet. Fits 8 cards, my checkbook, coins, and bills. The zipper pull on the coin part had fallen off but I was able to put it back in and clamp it closed so it will not fall off again. But even with that little mishap, I absolutely love my new wallet!
customer_reviews.author: QTDiva

customer_reviews.title: I really do like this wallet
customer_reviews.text: I really do like this wallet. It has lots of places for credit cards and ID. There is an ample coin pocket and place for bills. The leather seems to be of good quality and the price was very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Dwinskie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before I ordered this wallet. But, I have to disagree with the other reviews. The leather felt more like plastic, the pockets for the credit cards were very small and it was difficult to get my cards in, the ID slots were very small and I could not get one of my IDs in. The zipper to the change pocket was also broken.
customer_reviews.author: Holt Home

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing purchase
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the wallet on 13th, promised on the 15th then get a message it will be here on 16th for sure. I received another message saying it will be delivered on the 18th, now again not until the 21st! I like the look and quality but have not received and if not by the 21st then I am asking for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Watch what you bye
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it was a very nice wallet I had it one month and this is what’s going on so unfortunately it has fallen apart not by my behalf but I guess it’s it’s in my purse and that’s what happens
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie Borrego

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet!
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is big enough to hold all that I need. I love the color too. Now all I have to do is find a purse in the same color and style.
customer_reviews.author: B. Rakes

customer_reviews.title: Nice wallet, but not a fan of shiny black leather personally.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice wallet but unfortunately the black leather just looks a little too cheap for me and shiny. I knew this may happen because it is an inexpensive item. But I was really hoping for the best! The inside quality though is very nice. If you like a shinier leather I say buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Logan S.

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The slots that hold the credit cards are a little too tight so its hard to get them in and out, but the provider is super easy to work with, they gave me a partial refund. Great customer service! I've had it for a couple of weeks now and I really do like it. Its super spacious and fits my Galaxy S6 even with its bulky lifeproof case.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Smells like a fart but it’s useful.
customer_reviews.text: This thing wreaks of gasoline or something that smells as bad as gasoline! The pockets on one side are too small for my cards but the pockets on the other aren’t. It’s obviously very cheaply made but it does look exactly like the picture!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Nice wallet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift and fell in love with it myself! Wish I would have bought it for myself! Looks like nice quality material. The person I got it for likes the gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie T.

customer_reviews.title: Love it :). Update snap broke fast
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this wallet! Looks good and feels like it’s made well. Plenty of room inside and was delivered fast! Am very happy with my purchase :) Update still love wallet but am disappointed the snap has broke so fast
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Michele

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Color is pretty. Not a sturdy wallet though. And I’ve had it for a month and the card pockets on the inside have already ripped all the way open. Cheaply made. Wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: The color and feel of the wallet are very nice. The card slots are very small
customer_reviews.text: The color and feel of the wallet are very nice. The card slots are very small, however, and my debit card barely fits inside the slot. Some of my rewards cards from stores (like Toys R Us) don't fit at all.
customer_reviews.author: JPinchette

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wallet
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is awesome! Very spacious, nice color and design, cash fits in it without folding. It was delivered quickly and came in a cute box with a nice note. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Nice wallet 😊
customer_reviews.text: Really nice wallet, great design but it’s just not what I thought I wanted so sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Charity Rose

customer_reviews.title: OurBag Wallet
customer_reviews.text: My product looks just as pictured. All of my cards fit perfectly and it was easy to put in and remove without any issues. The color is a true match to an already purchased handbag and I really love my new wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality wallet.
customer_reviews.text: In less than 2 months, it was tearing at the clasp. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Melony

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and the compartments. Just enough card slots.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Can tell how cheap it is
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok, definitely can tel it’s plastic, it’s cheap so it’s fine
customer_reviews.author: Nvtxricka

customer_reviews.title: Pretty wallet
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for mom so I can’t speak to its durability but it is a lovely wallet. Well designed and vibrantly purple!
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Lot of room in this wallet
customer_reviews.text: I like this wallet. The color & design are attractive. It has several slots in it & they are large enough to remove cards from without using pliers. It still looks like new. The only thing I would change is the material. I wish it were leather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this wallet! I got this as a Christmas gift for my mother (I like to shop early). When I opened the package and seen this, it made me want to buy one for myself. It’s very beautiful, I’m sure she will love it as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Mattea

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best wallet I have ever bought in my life. I even have a Louis Vuitton wallet that I paid a small mint for & it doesn’t even come close to how beautifully made & the quality is in this wallet .
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn Faust

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: but it hasn't softened in the time I have had it. I wonder how much is really leather. I like the design.
customer_reviews.author: midlifer

customer_reviews.title: Cheep looking not leather!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for Xmas gifts. They looked a lot nicer in the picture. They do not look like leather!!! Still in the box on my table.
customer_reviews.author: bridgette burnett

customer_reviews.title: I love my wallet only reason for 4 stars is it ...
customer_reviews.text: I love my wallet only reason for 4 stars is it has an odor to it I applied a leather oil and that helped lessen the smell. The wallet is beautiful and has perfect amount of space
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Well Made and Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful and well made at an affordable price. Yes, I would highly recommend. No fancy name grace name brand needed. I love it,!
customer_reviews.author: Quintin W.

customer_reviews.title: It is soft leather. The stitching is good.
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is well made. The design is beautigul without being too much. It was a gift for my daughter and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would order this will it again and use it as a gift
customer_reviews.text: So many birthdays this year I'm using this wallet as a gift she was so surprised
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love this wallet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wallet because my former one is too small. This one is big enough to carry all my cards, cash and coins. The leather looks very well made. It is beautiful and feels great. Also I can put my iphone into it. I like this big wallet and I'm very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: I just love the color and feel of this wallet
customer_reviews.text: I just love the color and feel of this wallet. I've gotten ton's of compliments when I'm at the checkout counters. Lot's of room. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Donia

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful leather exterior with the perforation design
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful leather exterior with the perforation design. The interior is some sort of plastic material and the magnetic closure starting ripping away from the back. The magnet worked great but the tearing is a definite problem. Sadly the return time is closed.
customer_reviews.author: J & D

customer_reviews.title: Love the size
customer_reviews.text: Love the size, color, feel! I am happy with it! I see other people that have wallets that hold their cell phones, but I am not quite ready for that! I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Julie S. Mccracken

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift. The person loved it. It was spacious enough to hold bills without folding them. There was enough room for cards and coins. This is a great buy. Since it is recently purchased, can't speak to its durability.
customer_reviews.author: kris

customer_reviews.title: Cute wallet
customer_reviews.text: Love the design. The pockets are ID/credit cards stick a little, but hopefully will loosen up over time. My only complaint is that the zipper for the coin pouch constantly sticks and is sometimes hard to unzip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: The wallet is exactly as I hoped it would be. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great size if you want the option to carry it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great size if you want the option to carry it as a clutch because there's room for a phone and small set of keys. The only issue for me was that the card holders are longer than standard-sized credit cards so when they cards are fully in, they are hidden and I have to reach in and pull them out. Would be a better design if the top of the cards stuck out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it, and put my things in it. Initial review is that it’s exactly as advertised! We’ll see how it holds up, but so far, I’m pleased. My only complaint this far is that the zipper for the coin purse seems cheaply made and feels as though it may break if pulled on too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Boooo
customer_reviews.text: Boris piece for ever bought here! Cheap and terrible. 3 weeks and tossed into the garbage
customer_reviews.author: MAX

customer_reviews.title: Super nice!
customer_reviews.text: Love this billfold Color is just as it seems Well made and easy to use! Super nice!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Women's Wallet
customer_reviews.text: This wallet exceeded my expectations! It's much bigger than I thought it would be, which is fine for me... Lots of space for cards, money, change... Feels nice in the hands as well...
customer_reviews.author: Nikkole Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Ugly Cheap Wallet
customer_reviews.text: Terrible cheap wallet! Made in China and it is NOT leather!
customer_reviews.author: Bella’s  Mom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wallet.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice, supple leather wallet. I'm going to get another for a gift. It really holds a lot of things.
customer_reviews.author: D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLANT buy.
customer_reviews.text: I love a leather wallet but dont want to spend $100.00 for it. This wallet is beautiful and very well made and in lots of colors.
customer_reviews.author: Dif

product_meta.title: OURBAG Women Leather Wallet Clutch Purse Card Holder Ladies Hollow Out Long Wallet
feature_bullets: ✔【HQ MATERIAL】This leather credit card holder wallet has good craftsmanship, high quality PU leather, button closure classical and refining design.Metal ziper is smooth and great quality ,works very well.

✔【STRUCTURE】This womens leather wallet has 8 credit card slots, 2 bill pockets,1 zipper pocket, Plenty of room, provides a lot of room for cards, money, phone, ID card/ Driver license, coins etc. Dimensions: 7.48 x 1.18 x 3.93 inch. Great for phone fits inside.

✔【Perfect Purse for Any Occasions】This Slim Wallet perfect for all kinds of party, shopping, travel, restaurant. Great gift for women/Girls. Great Gift for Women/ Girls. Great shopping/travel/party wallet purse, go greatly with your handbag/Purse/ Backpack.

✔【HOLLOW OUT DESIGN】OURBAG Envelope Wallet is fashionable European & America style with luxury looking and feeling. Hollow Out Wallet is Fashion, Beautiful and Classy, Vintage, you will love this fantastic wallet and has compliments on it.

✔【AFTER-SALE SERVICE】We offer excellent customer service. If you have any problems after purchasing, please feel free to contact the seller by email. We will full refund or resend a replacement bag / matching part ASAP. Choose us, you will get a nice family who will always stand by you!
